code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import{loginUser}from'../services/api';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const{login}=useAuth();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError(null);const loginRequest={email,password};try{const response=await loginUser(loginRequest);login(response);navigate('/');}catch(err){setError('Inloggningen misslyckades.
